original_text: But he himself went a day's journey into the wilderness and came and sat down under a broom tree. And he asked that he might die, saying, “It is enough; now, O Lord, take away my life, for I am no better than my fathers.”
korean_text: 자기 자신은 광야로 들어가 하룻길쯤 가서 한 로뎀 나무 아래에 앉아서 자기가 죽기를 원하여 이르되 여호와여 넉넉하오니 지금 내 생명을 거두시옵소서 나는 내 조상들보다 낫지 못하니이다 하고

sentences.original_text: But he himself went a day's journey into the wilderness
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 스스로 광야로 하루 길을 들어가서

sentences.original_text: and sat down under a broom tree.
And he asked that he might die,
for I am no better than my fathers.”
